input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making choices:
target_text: Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about pursuing your passions:
target_text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about believing in your potential:
target_text: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about pursuing your dreams:
target_text: Live the Life of Your Dreams: Be brave enough to live the life of your dreams according to your vision and purpose instead of the expectations and opinions of others.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about stepping outside your comfort zone:
target_text: It’s only after you’ve stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about forgiveness:
target_text: The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless you realize that the situation is over, you cannot move forward.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about doing the right thing:
target_text: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making a positive difference in the world:
target_text: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about following your passions:
target_text: Pursue what catches your heart, not what catches your eyes.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about starting each day with gratitude:
target_text: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about gratitude:
target_text: Be grateful for what you already have while you pursue your goals. If you aren’t grateful for what you already have, what makes you think you would be happy with more.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about choosing one's attitude and way in life:
target_text: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the human freedoms—to choose one’s attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one’s own way.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about savoring the journey:
target_text: Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about bravery:
target_text: Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about letting go:
target_text: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance and overcoming challenges:
target_text: Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about time management:
target_text: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about stepping out of your comfort zone:
target_text: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Do not let the memories of your past limit the potential of your future. There are no limits to what you can achieve on your journey through life, except in your mind.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-growth and positivity:
target_text: Let the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking control of your life:
target_text: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about believing in oneself:
target_text: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about dealing with obstacles:
target_text: Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about pushing boundaries:
target_text: The only way of discovering the limits of the possible is to venture a little way past them into the impossible.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about surrounding yourself with positive influences:
target_text: Surround Yourself with People Who Believe in Your Dreams:Surround yourself with people who believe in your dreams, encourage your ideas, support your ambitions, and bring out the best in you.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Sometimes life knocks you on your ass... get up, get up, get up!!! Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about following your passion:
target_text: Do what you love, love what you do, and with all your heart give yourself to it.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about challenging the status quo:
target_text: Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Once you realize you deserve a bright future, letting go of your dark past is the best choice you will ever make.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about ambition and hard work:
target_text: Without ambition one starts nothing. Without work one finishes nothing. The prize will not be sent to you. You have to win it.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about standing up for your beliefs:
target_text: If you believe very strongly in something, stand up and fight for it.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about changing your perspective:
target_text: Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making small changes for self-improvement:
target_text: It's never too late to change your life for the better. You don't have to take huge steps to change your life. Making even the smallest changes to your daily routine can make a big difference to your life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about gratitude and helping others:
target_text: Always remember people who have helped you along the way, and don’t forget to lift someone up.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking responsibility:
target_text: Maturity is when you stop complaining and making excuses, and start making changes.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about healthy relationships:
target_text: When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: What's done is done. What's gone is gone. One of life's lessons is always moving on. It’s okay to look back to see how far you’ve come but keep moving forward.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-worth and independence:
target_text: Strong people have a strong sense of self-worth and self-awareness; they don’t need the approval of others.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Never stop dreaming, never stop believing, never give up, never stop trying, and never stop learning.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: When the going gets tough, put one foot in front of the other and just keep going. Don’t give up.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking control of your own happiness and life:
target_text: Stop giving other people the power to control your happiness, your mind, and your life. If you don't take control of yourself and your own life, someone else is bound to try.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking action:
target_text: At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming past regrets:
target_text: We all make mistakes, have struggles, and even regret things in our past. But you are not your mistakes, you are not your struggles, and you are here NOW with the power to shape your day and your future.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding your passion:
target_text: If you have a strong purpose in life, you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the power of determination:
target_text: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-worth:
target_text: I will not try to convince you to love me, to respect me, to commit to me. I deserve better than that; I AM BETTER THAN THAT...Goodbye.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: Although the world is full of suffering, it is full also of the overcoming of it.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about letting go:
target_text: You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-empowerment:
target_text: Make a pact with yourself today to not be defined by your past. Sometimes the greatest thing to come out of all your hard work isn't what you get for it, but what you become for it. Shake things up today! Be You...Be Free...Share.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: Circumstances are the rulers of the weak; they are but the instruments of the wise.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about helping others in challenging times:
target_text: The strongest people find the courage and caring to help others, even if they are going through their own storm.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about pursuing your passions:
target_text: The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about humility and resilience:
target_text: Do not let arrogance go to your head and despair to your heart; do not let compliments go to your head and criticisms to your heart; do not let success go to your head and failure to your heart.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the power of influence:
target_text: You cannot change anyone, but you can be the reason someone changes.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about living with love and gratitude:
target_text: Each day brings new opportunities, allowing you to constantly live with love—be there for others—bring a little light into someone's day. Be grateful and live each day to the fullest.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing challenges:
target_text: Do not stop thinking of life as an adventure. You have no security unless you can live bravely, excitingly, imaginatively; unless you can choose a challenge instead of competence.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking initiative:
target_text: Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about facing fears:
target_text: Courage is feeling fear, not getting rid of fear, and taking action in the face of fear.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about stepping out of your comfort zone:
target_text: To have what you have never had, you have to do what you have never done.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about surrounding yourself with the right people:
target_text: If you hang out with chickens, you're going to cluck and if you hang out with eagles, you're going to fly.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Live the Life of Your DreamsWhen you start living the life of your dreams, there will always be obstacles, doubters, mistakes and setbacks along the way. But with hard work, perseverance and self-belief there is no limit to what you can achieve.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about influence:
target_text: You are the average of the five people you spend the most time with.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about positive thinking:
target_text: You Are the Master of Your AttitudeYou cannot control what happens to you, but you can control the way you think about all the events. You always have a choice. You can choose to face them with a positive mental attitude.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: People are always blaming their circumstances for what they are. I don't believe in circumstances. The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for the circumstances they want, and if they can't find them, make them.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Renew, release, let go. Yesterday’s gone. There’s nothing you can do to bring it back. You can’t should’ve done something. You can only DO something. Renew yourself. Release that attachment. Today is a new day!

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about speaking positively about others:
target_text: How would your life be different if...You walked away from gossip and verbal defamation? Let today be the day...You speak only the good you know of other people and encourage others to do the same.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about living in the present:
target_text: Forget yesterday - it has already forgotten you. Don't sweat tomorrow - you haven't even met. Instead, open your eyes and your heart to a truly precious gift - today.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the importance of passion and purpose:
target_text: I write for the same reason I breathe - because if I didn't, I would die.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-belief:
target_text: Don’t let others tell you what you can’t do. Don't let the limitations of others limit your vision. If you can remove your self-doubt and believe in yourself, you can achieve what you never thought possible.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about facing challenges:
target_text: You have to accept whatever comes, and the only important thing is that you meet it with the best you have to give.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about pushing boundaries:
target_text: Only he who attempts the absurd is capable of achieving the impossible.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, "aw shit, he's up!

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: Don't wish it were easier. Wish you were better.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about trust:
target_text: In the end, you have to choose whether or not to trust someone.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about leadership:
target_text: Great leaders create more leaders, not followers.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: If you don’t give up on something you truly believe in, you will find a way.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about turning adversity into strength:
target_text: Turn your obstacles into opportunities and your problems into possibilities.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Don't confuse poor decision-making with destiny. Own your mistakes. It’s ok; we all make them. Learn from them so they can empower you!

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking the next step:
target_text: The most important step a man can take. It's not the first one, is it? It's the next one. Always the next step, Dalinar.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about handling anger gracefully:
target_text: Never respond to an angry person with a fiery comeback, even if he deserves it...Don't allow his anger to become your anger.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Don't fear failure. — Not failure, but low aim, is the crime. In great attempts it is glorious even to fail.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making a positive impact:
target_text: Be the positive impact on the lives of others.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Rejection is an opportunity for your selection.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about pursuing goals:
target_text: Dreams don't work unless you take action. The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about facing adversity:
target_text: It takes sunshine and rain to make a rainbow. There would be no rainbows without sunshine and rain.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: I cannot let the fear of the past color the future.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about compassion:
target_text: Want to keep Christ in Christmas? Feed the hungry, clothe the naked, forgive the guilty, welcome the unwanted, care for the ill, love your enemies, and do unto others as you would have done unto you.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: It doesn’t matter how many times you get knocked down. All that matters is you get up one more time than you were knocked down.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Failure is a bend in the road, not the end of the road. Learn from failure and keep moving forward.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding your passion:
target_text: It doesn't matter what you did or where you were...it matters where you are and what you're doing. Get out there! Sing the song in your heart and NEVER let anyone shut you up!!

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing vulnerability:
target_text: It takes guts and humility to admit mistakes. Admitting we're wrong is courage, not weakness.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about positive thinking:
target_text: Discipline Your Mind to Think Positively: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-empowerment:
target_text: First say to yourself what you would be;and then do what you have to do.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: The one who falls and gets up is stronger than the one who never tried. Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about staying focused:
target_text: What you stay focused on will grow.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking initiative:
target_text: Don’t wait for things to happen. Make them happen.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about trust and integrity:
target_text: Be silent and safe — silence never betrays you; Be true to your word and your work and your friend; Put least trust in him who is foremost to praise you,Nor judge of a road till it draw to the end.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about challenging limitations:
target_text: You learn something valuable from all of the significant events and people, but you never touch your true potential until you challenge yourself to go beyond imposed limitations.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Challenge and adversity are meant to help you know who you are. Storms hit your weakness, but unlock your true strength.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about reaching your full potential:
target_text: You were put on this earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking on challenges:
target_text: Stop doing what is easy. Start doing what is right.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about internal transformation:
target_text: Changing your outside world cannot make you happy if you are an unhappy person. The real personal change can only happen from the inside out. If you firstly create the change within yourself, you can turn your life around.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making others feel important:
target_text: 7 Effective Ways to Make Others Feel Important 1. Use their name.2. Express sincere gratitude.3. Do more listening than talking.4. Talk more about them than about you.5. Be authentically interested.6. Be sincere in your praise.7. Show you care.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seizing opportunities:
target_text: Don't wait for the right moment to start, start and make each moment right.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about sowing positivity and reaping abundance:
target_text: Plant seeds of happiness, hope, success, and love; it will all come back to you in abundance. This is the law of nature.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about turning setbacks into opportunities:
target_text: When things do not go your way, remember that every challenge — every adversity — contains within it the seeds of opportunity and growth.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about bringing out the best in others:
target_text: Good people see the good and bring out the best in other people.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about standards and achievement:
target_text: Make the most of the best and the best of the worst, and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about gratitude:
target_text: Gratitude builds a bridge to abundance.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking proactive actions:
target_text: The universe doesn’t give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing uniqueness:
target_text: You were born to stand out, stop trying to fit in.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the power of belief:

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-empowerment:
target_text: You are essentially who you create yourself to be and all that occurs in your life is the result of your own making.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about letting go of control:
target_text: The reason many people in our society are miserable, sick, and highly stressed is because of an unhealthy attachment to things they have no control over.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about prioritizing what truly matters in life:
target_text: Life is short. Focus on what really matters most. You have to change your priorities over time.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: It doesn't matter if a million people tell you what you can't do, or if ten million tell you no. If you get one yes from God that's all you need.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Change may not always bring growth, but there is no growth without change.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about recognizing potential in others:
target_text: Great leaders can see the greatness in others when they can’t see it themselves and lead them to their highest potential they don’t even know.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking control of your attitude:
target_text: When you take control of your attitude, you take control of your life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: The right thing to do and the hard thing to do are usually the same.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making tough decisions:
target_text: Stop doing what is easy or popular. Start doing what is right.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: I promise you nothing is as chaotic as it seems. Nothing is worth diminishing your health. Nothing is worth poisoning yourself into stress, anxiety, and fear.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about influence and importance:
target_text: One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about passion:
target_text: Enthusiasm can help you find the new doors, but it takes passion to open them. If you have a strong purpose in life, you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about stepping out of your comfort zone:
target_text: The comfort zone is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure. You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about letting go of the past:
target_text: Let go of something old that no longer serves you in order to make room for something new.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming adversity:
target_text: My past has not defined me, destroyed me, deterred me, or defeated me; it has only strengthened me.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about rising above trivial challenges:
target_text: One resolution I have made, and try always to keep, is this: ‘To rise above little things’.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing failure:
target_text: To learn something new, you need to try new things and not be afraid to be wrong.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about respecting oneself and maintaining self-worth:
target_text: I cannot compromise my respect for your love. You can keep your love, I will keep my respect.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the power of connection:
target_text: It's funny how, in this journey of life, even though we may begin at different times and places, our paths cross with others so that we may share our love, compassion, observations, and hope. This is a design of God that I appreciate and cherish.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about consistency:
target_text: Consistency is the true foundation of trust. Either keep your promises or do not make them.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Everything is hard before it is easy

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making a positive impact:
target_text: Shine your light and make a positive impact on the world; there is nothing so honorable as helping improve the lives of others.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about pursuing individual paths in life:
target_text: Dream your own dreams, achieve your own goals. Your journey is your own and unique.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking responsibility for your own emotions:
target_text: The discontent and frustration that you feel is entirely your own creation.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about leadership:
target_text: Great Leaders Create More LeadersGood leaders have vision and inspire others to help them turn vision into reality. Great leaders create more leaders, not followers. Great leaders have vision, share vision, and inspire others to create their own.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding inspiration in others:
target_text: Be with someone who inspires you and makes you be the best version of yourself.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: The greatest step towards a life of simplicity is to learn to let go.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: Life teaches us the right path is rarely the easy one.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: The harder you fall, the heavier your heart; the heavier your heart, the stronger you climb; the stronger you climb, the higher your pedestal.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking responsibility:
target_text: Every choice comes with a consequence. Once you make a choice, you must accept responsibility. You cannot escape the consequences of your choices, whether you like them or not.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about kindness:
target_text: Keep in mind that the true measure of an individual is how he treats a person who can do him absolutely no good.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding one's purpose:
target_text: Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: Failures are the stairs we climb to reach success.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about achieving success:
target_text: No one has ever achieved greatness without dreams.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-discovery:
target_text: Free yourself from the complexities and drama of your life. Simplify. Look within. Within ourselves we all have the gifts and talents we need to fulfill the purpose we've been blessed with.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about achieving dreams and putting in effort:
target_text: You can have everything you want if you can put your heart and soul into everything you do.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking risks:
target_text: Live boldly. Push yourself. Don't settle.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Stay strong, stay positive, and never give up.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about learning from failure:
target_text: How much you can learn when you fail determines how far you will go into achieving your goals.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Change course, but don’t give up.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about gratitude:
target_text: Those with a grateful mindset tend to see the message in the mess. And even though life may knock them down, the grateful find reasons, if even small ones, to get up.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about continuous self-improvement:
target_text: No matter how much experience you have, there’s always something new you can learn and room for improvement.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about creating a vision for your dream life:
target_text: Create a vision for the life you really want and then work relentlessly towards making it a reality.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Do not let your negative thoughts have power over you because those thoughts will end up controlling your life. No one can live a positive life with a negative mind.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about staying present and focused:
target_text: Be where you are, stop over-thinking, and focus on what you are doing.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about setting intentions:
target_text: If you have a goal, write it down. If you do not write it down, you do not have a goal - you have a wish.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the power of connection:
target_text: You are never alone. You are eternally connected with everyone.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: If you care about something enough, you'll find a way to make it happen.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming fear:
target_text: To overcome fear is the quickest way to gain your self-confidence.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: One must always be prepared for riotous and endless waves of transformation.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about staying true to yourself:
target_text: Plants are more courageous than almost all human beings: an orange tree would rather die than produce lemons, whereas instead of dying the average person would rather be someone they are not.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience and commitment:
target_text: What helps you persevere is your resilience and commitment.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about positive thinking:
target_text: Instead of worrying about what could go wrong, change your thoughts to what could go right. When you change the negative thought into a positive one, it eliminates the negative one.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-belief:
target_text: If you believe you can, you might. If you know you can, you will.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about personal growth:
target_text: You make the world a better place by making daily improvements to become the best version of yourself.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about being selfless:
target_text: A gentleman is someone who does not what he wants to do, but what he should do.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the power of positive thinking:
target_text: Be careful the stories you're telling yourself about your current circumstances; a head full of negative thoughts has no space for positive ones.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about consistency:
target_text: It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives. It's what we do consistently.
