target_text: Life is an ongoing journey of self-discovery. Embrace the lessons and keep evolving.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing uncertainty:
target_text: Embrace the unknown, for it is where true growth and transformation happen.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing failure:
target_text: Success is not about achieving perfection; it's about making progress and learning from failures.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: The splendour of life is often experienced after you have overcome the challenges in your path.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding happiness in challenging times:
target_text: Things may not be going well in your life, but you are still alive. That is all that matters. Look for every opportunity possible to find happiness in your path.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about living with purpose:
target_text: This is life, figure out what needs to be done and do it right; that is how you live a fruitful life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seizing opportunities:
target_text: This is your only chance to give life your best shot. Do not miss it at all!

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the journey of life:
target_text: This life does not have a best friend. It only has voyagers who travel from their date of birth until their date of death.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about avoiding drama in life:
target_text: Watching drama play out from afar could seem fun, but it can be very sad if it is in your life. Avoid any form of drama and stay away from those who fuel it with their lies.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about doing the right thing:
target_text: Whatever you do, do it right. If it comes back to you later in life, you will be glad you did what was right.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: When life seems hard, work hard to overcome those hardships. Yes, it may take a while for the breakthroughs to come to pass, but when you do what you must and do it right, one day you will be super proud.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the power of positivity:
target_text: When the right people walk into your life, the right things start to happen.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about navigating through life's challenges:
target_text: When you are surrounded by those who make life easy, you will enjoy it. But in the company of those who complicate things, life will not be easy.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about competition:
target_text: When you compete with others in life, you miss the chance to complete your own race with grace.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: When you feel all alone and in the dark, never give up. When the time is right, life will grant you great rewards.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about rewriting the story of your life:
target_text: When you rewrite the story of your life, make sure the new chapters are better than the old ones.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about rewriting the story of your life:
target_text: When you rewrite the story of your life, make sure the new chapters are much better than the old ones.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Work hard now so that in the evening of your life, you can still enjoy the sunrise.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking responsibility:
target_text: You know you have mastered the art of life when you refuse to be the one who points fingers, and decide to be the one who helps find the right answers.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking ownership of your life:
target_text: Your life is your business. Take care of it and treat it like serious business. Do not get too involved in other people’s businesses and neglect yours in the process.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the journey to success:
target_text: It takes some time to succeed in life because true success is not just about the money, but also about the great lessons learned on the path to success.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about achieving success through focused determination:
target_text: Identify your top three goals and demolish the number one obstacle. Stay laser-focused and fiercely determined on your objective, and success will be yours for the taking.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about setting meaningful goals:
target_text: Whether you want to double down on previous successes, address significant challenges, or embark on new endeavors, identify your top three goals.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about pursuing your dreams:
target_text: Don’t wait for success to find you. Identify the skills and knowledge you need, pursue them relentlessly, and watch as you surpass your wildest dreams.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about completing goals:
target_text: Don’t let unfinished business weigh you down. Finish what you started and unlock the door to limitless possibilities.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about personal growth and self-improvement:
target_text: Reflect on the impact you make each day. Ask yourself, if someone replaced you today, what would they bring? Strive for excellence, build your skills, and own your success.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about time management:
target_text: Time is the fuel of life. Use it wisely, prioritize your tasks, and unlock your full potential.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about developing healthy habits:
target_text: Transform your life, one habit at a time. Develop daily practices that align with your goals, stay consistent, and become unstoppable.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about facing challenges:
target_text: Obstacles are opportunities in disguise. Stay motivated, stay productive, and hold yourself accountable for your success. With every challenge, you grow stronger and closer to your goals.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about inner resilience:
target_text: In the depths of struggle, we discover the true strength that resides within us.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: The struggle you face today is the strength you will carry tomorrow.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about being part of the solution:
target_text: Make it your sole intention to be part of the solution. When you learn how to efficiently solve problems, you will attract many opportunities.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-discovery:
target_text: In life, some questions do not require you to get answers from outside. They need you to search on the inside.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about not jumping to conclusions:
target_text: In recent years, it has become increasingly difficult to digest some situations because of people who make assumptions about life's conditions based solely on screenshots, oblivious to what occurred before those screenshots.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about defining yourself:
target_text: It is hard to define life entirely, but what I know about life is that it will give you a chance to define yourself. So do your level best to put yourself out there.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-compassion:
target_text: It is okay not to be okay when things are not okay in your life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about prioritizing self-care and meaningful relationships:
target_text: It is significant to look after yourself and your significant others. In the process, do away with the insignificant things in life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about realizing your potential:
target_text: It is vital to be useful in life because when you do not use your gifts, you become useless.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Learn to allow some chapters in your life to close so you can start new, beautiful chapters.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Learn to prohibit anything that hinders your progress in life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Life is a one-way trip with no return ticket. Always remember that you are in transit.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about comparison and empathy:
target_text: Never desire someone else’s life. You have no clue what they have been through. You may also not fully understand what they are going through.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing individual pace and progress:
target_text: The essence of life is to live it, not as a competition but as a race. In this race, you can crawl, walk, or run the best way you deem fit, as long as you are moving forward.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: Never let the tragedies of life transform you into a human tragedy.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about prioritizing personal well-being over material wealth:
target_text: No amount of wealth is worth your life. Never sell your soul in exchange for a fat cheque. Remember that you can only enjoy that wealth when you are alive.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about kindness:
target_text: No matter the difficulties you face, do not be a difficult person. Choose to make life easy for others.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making sense of the world:
target_text: Not everything will make sense in life; that does not mean you should accept nonsense.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about kindness:
target_text: One act of kindness can change or even save someone's life. Be kind to yourself and others!

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about cherishing meaningful relationships:
target_text: Precious moments with precious people can help you realize how precious life can be.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about choosing positive relationships:
target_text: Save your life. Stay away from people who do not like to see you smile.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-reflection:
target_text: Self-evaluation helps you identify areas that need attention in your life. So, make time to learn more about who you are.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about avoiding shortcuts:
target_text: Shortcuts can cut your life short. Avoid them at all costs.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about letting go of toxic relationships:
target_text: Showing some people, the door when their time in your life is up is not a crime; it is a proactive stance to save your life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about deserving good things in life:
target_text: Some things will feel too good to be true, but never feel bad about them because you also deserve good things in life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about determination:
target_text: Heart, brain and backbone,if you have these three,you have everything to succeed.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Sometimes life will make you smile, and other times it will make you frown. Life has its ups and downs. Yours is to make every day count.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Sometimes life will require that you walk a million miles. Do it, no matter how hard it becomes. One day, you will look back and be proud that you were able to do that.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about helping yourself and maintaining your peace:
target_text: Sometimes people will come into your life asking for your help, only for them to put you in a mess. Help yourself by all means; do not allow anyone’s mess to leave you in distress.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience and compassion:
target_text: Sometimes the more you do good, the more tragedies you will experience in life, but you can sleep well at night knowing you have done your best to help others.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the power of positive thinking:
target_text: The quality of your thoughts determines how far you can go in life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making a difference:
target_text: When you do your due diligence to make a difference, you will live a life of elegance.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making a difference with actions rather than words:
target_text: You can make a difference even with your silence. Life is not always about making unnecessary noise. What matters is what you do to make a difference.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about appreciating life's lessons:
target_text: Appreciate the lessons brought to you by the courtesy of life. Some came through sweat and blood, but significant for your path.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: If you can endure the process and look back with a clear thought process, you will realize that some of life's best lessons came from a place where you were rejected.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about unexpected life lessons:
target_text: In your life, there are things you never expected yet they happened. That is because they needed to happen for you to learn some necessary lessons.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about staying resilient in the face of challenges:
target_text: Learn to be open-minded. Master the right lessons and do not ignore the red flags, for they can hinder your progress.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about lifelong learning:
target_text: Life is a mandatory school for the living. Everyone is a learner because every day, life offers mandatory lessons.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about learning from life's subtle lessons:
target_text: Life offers many free lessons, but most people would rather pay the heavy price of ignorance because they cannot pay attention to the subtle lessons of life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about learning from life's lessons:
target_text: Life will always teach you good lessons and if you are a good learner, you will become wiser.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing life's lessons:
target_text: What distinguishes the wise from the unwise is their ability to embrace life’s distinctive lessons.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-discovery:
target_text: Know who you are; it will help you live a good life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about living life to the fullest:
target_text: Life comes once. Live wisely.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Life is a one-way road with no reverse option, so live it with caution and avoid any commotion.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Life is a temporary trip through this world, so do not live as if you are a permanent resident.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: Life is easy when you live among people who do not make things difficult for you.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about cherishing life:
target_text: Life is precious. Live your own life, love it and look after it.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about triumphing over life's challenges:
target_text: Life will always have highs and lows. Learn to live triumphantly, no matter what happens.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seizing opportunities:
target_text: Life will offer you a unique experience, so ensure you live each day without fear, doubt, or regret.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about living with purpose:
target_text: The best way to live a better life is to do your best while you still have breath.

input_text: yamlProvide a motivational quote about leaving a lasting legacy:
target_text: Time will keep moving even after your life comes to an end. So, make sure you live well and leave a legacy that can outlast your time on earth.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making a lasting impact:
target_text: As the grass withers with time, so does life fade away. That is why you need to make an impact while you still have a chance.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about progress:
target_text: At every level of your life, you need to take a step forward, or else you will remain the same and be left behind.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: Be ready to adjust in life because it can get bumpy at any time.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making the most of every moment:
target_text: A combination of minutes makes one’s lifetime. Make sure that none of those counts as wasted time.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding contentment within oneself:
target_text: Even if life had happened the way you wanted, you would still be disgruntled because it is not what happens that makes you content but how you choose to react.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding contentment in one's own journey:
target_text: Even if you admire someone else’s life, do not desire it, for you do not know what they have gone through.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking personal responsibility:
target_text: Even if you have the best mentors, you still have to go out and do the work. No one can do life on your behalf.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about focusing on self-improvement:
target_text: Fixate your eyes on things that can fix your life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about facing adversity:
target_text: Harsh words spoken to you must not depict the end of your dreams. Use those words to energize you into doing something great. In life, champions are those who are not afraid to fly high, regardless of any attempt to pull them down.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about simplifying life:
target_text: If you can understand the basics of life, you are better than a person who complicates even the easiest things.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about focusing on personal growth:
target_text: If you want success in your life, do not focus on what others are doing. Instead, focus on what you should be doing.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: It is not always easy to go through life. Sometimes stuff happens and you face hard times, but you do not have to be hard on yourself. You can still do your best and become a great success.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about balance and success:
target_text: Success in one area of life and failure in another can affect your stance on success. Aim to succeed in the key areas of life so you will not feel like a failure.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance and success:
target_text: Your success in life will depend on whether or not you are willing to persevere and follow the necessary processes until you get there.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about prioritizing self-care:
target_text: If you value your time, do not entertain anything that does not edify your life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about protecting your peace of mind:
target_text: If you want a valuable life, ensure that whosoever is part of your inner circle protects your peace of mind and adds value in their own right.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about valuing your time:
target_text: Life can never be a dress rehearsal. It is real. Value your time and put no value on people or things that add no value to your life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing individuality:
target_text: Look around. You will never find another person with your exact kind of life. Your path is unique. So, make sure that your thoughts, convictions and values enable you to add value.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-worth:
target_text: No matter what happens in life, never underestimate your own value.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about valuing one's unique experiences and journey through life:
target_text: Value your life. You have been given a rare chance to live; remember that no one else can have that life but you.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about surrounding yourself with positive influences:
target_text: You should not deny yourself a profitable life by associating with people who add no value.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-worth:
target_text: Your life is more valuable than all the precious stones in this world. Realize your own value and do something of value.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about celebrating life's unpredictability:
target_text: Beyond today, no one knows how life will turn out. So, while you can, celebrate the special moments.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about celebrating life:
target_text: Capture the best moments in life, and overlook the bad ones. Learn to celebrate life while you still have time.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about living in the present moment:
target_text: Celebrate the present moment and never dwell on what happened in the past if you want to enjoy life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about celebrating the gift of life:
target_text: Celebrate your life and remember that you were given a chance that many aborted babies were denied.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing life's twists and turns:
target_text: Do not get it twisted. Life will always have twists and turns. One way or another, your turn to celebrate or cry will come. Either way, live a joyful life!

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about celebrating and appreciating the impact of others in your life:
target_text: It is not easy to forget those who touched your life in a special way. It is good to celebrate life’s heroes while they are still alive. Choose to appreciate the good things they have done.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about celebrating life:
target_text: Life is a beautiful journey filled with discoveries every single day. So, as you go through each day, find ways to celebrate life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about celebrating life regardless of societal status:
target_text: The most important thing in life is not to be a celebrity. It is to be able to celebrate life regardless of your status in society.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about kindness:
target_text: Be good to yourself and others. When you do that, you will be able to make a difference in life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: If you want to make a difference in life, do not be terrified of change. It will position you in a higher dimension.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about choosing positivity despite challenging circumstances:
target_text: Life is amazing, but its amazing wonders are hard to realize when others become atrocious. Wherever you are, choose to be good, do good, and make a difference.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making a difference:
target_text: Life will present you with different people, things and places. What matters is what you do with them in order to make a difference.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making a meaningful difference in someone's life:
target_text: Make a meaningful difference in someone’s life. It is of paramount importance to them and you as well.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding purpose in life:
target_text: Not everyone was given a chance to be alive today. So, find happiness, enjoy your life and make a difference.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making a difference in life:
target_text: Things may get hard sometimes, but the most important thing is to make a difference in life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding purpose in life:
target_text: Those who know why they are on earth do not mind making a difference in life because they know what others do not know–purpose.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing uncertainty:
target_text: In life, it is wise to acknowledge that you do not know certain things. After all, no one knows everything.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the importance of taking life seriously:
target_text: In this life, do not take things lightly all the time. Have the wisdom to discern when things are serious.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing life's lessons:
target_text: Life offers various lessons, but it is your choice to take them or leave them. If you take those lessons, you will make your way into the world of wisdom.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about discernment and wisdom:
target_text: Life requires both discernment and wisdom because some people come to help solve problems, while others come to create more problems. Discernment will help you know them, and wisdom will help you know how to deal with them.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seeking wisdom and lessons in life:
target_text: Look for the lessons life presents, because through them you can gain the knowledge and wisdom to live well.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding wisdom in everyday experiences:
target_text: Many situations in life will make you wise if you learn to glean wisdom from the littlest things.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing wisdom:
target_text: When you embrace wisdom, it refines and redefines who you are in life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seeking guidance and wisdom from within:
target_text: Wisdom is the ability to close your eyes and open your mouth to ask God about His plans for your life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Your life will take better shape if you are willing to find wisdom and have the courage to climb the highest mountains.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking control of your destiny:
target_text: Do not sit back and let people make key plans on your behalf. Wake up and stand up for your life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about lifelong learning:
target_text: How far you will go in life depends on how far you are willing to learn, plan and implement the good lessons you have learned.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-motivation:
target_text: In this life, if you want to be in a league of your own, learn and plan to be your own cheerleader until you become a champion.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about effective planning and taking necessary action:
target_text: It is wise to plan effectively and do what is required in order to live a fruitful life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming life's challenges:
target_text: Life will always throw different situations at you, no matter who you are or where you are, but there is comfort in knowing that no situation will last forever. No matter how hard it gets, plan to overcome and there will always be a way out.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance and faith:
target_text: Never give up on yourself, no matter what happens in life. When you follow God's plans for your life, one day you will be fine.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience and hope:
target_text: No matter how hard life is for you right now, never attempt to take your own life. Give life another chance. Have better plans for the remaining years you have and you will be amazed by how far you get.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about planning and preparation:
target_text: Plan in advance to avoid unnecessary headaches in life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Some delays are meant to preserve your life. So do not be weary when things do not go according to your plan.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about pursuing your goals despite others' lack of understanding:
target_text: Sometimes people will not comprehend your plans. Go ahead and implement them if God is on your side because in life, not everything you do will make sense to others.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: When things fall apart after you have done your best, it does not mean you are a failure. Cherish your life, and let no one make you feel inferior. It only means things did not go according to plan, but you can still do better.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Life was designed to be neither painful nor pain-free. You have to journey through it, irrespective of the pain or pleasures along the way.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming past adversity:
target_text: Even if you have been through a painful past, do not dwell on that. What matters is that you are still alive. Bank on that and make your life count.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding joy in life's challenges:
target_text: Life will not always be pain-free. But as painful as it can sometimes be, being alive can also be pleasing.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: Sometimes, painful circumstances will find their way into your life. Be prepared for them and find ways to overcome them!

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming adversity:
target_text: You will inevitably go through pain. Do not let it take your life down the drain. Do something of value, regardless of the pain and focus on the things you can still gain.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about achieving success through learning, embracing uniqueness, and making a positive impact:
target_text: Success in life is possible if you allow yourself to learn, dare to be different and make a difference in the world.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about positive thinking:
target_text: If you always think of ways to succeed, you will find ways to succeed. In life, everything begins with how you think.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about success and sacrifice:
target_text: If you want a life of success, you should be ready to make the necessary sacrifices.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: Sometimes life will put you through tough times. Choose not to give up until you overcome.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: When you choose to capture the best moments in life, life becomes a beautiful adventure.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making positive life choices:
target_text: You are only presented with one life, and you can either choose to make it better or worse. Choose wisely!

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: You may not have everything right now, but you can choose to make something out of your life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about standing out and making a mark:
target_text: From time to time, life will present you with an opportunity to make your mark. Learn to discern and choose to be different. It is when you do the things that help you stand out that you will be able to shine your light.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Change is imminent in life because yesterday will never be the same as today or tomorrow. So be ready to handle each day as it comes.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Depend not on human beings because they change time and again. People who were once close can become estranged. That is the strange thing about life, it changes right in front of your eyes.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-compassion:
target_text: Do not beat yourself up about the things you cannot change. It will make your life difficult. Take heart and take charge of what you need to change.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Find yourself in the right spaces, go places and make the necessary changes. Life is not only about where you have been. It is also about places you should see and people you should meet.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: If you want to change your life, you must be willing to do two things that are critical. Firstly, change your mind and secondly, discard what does not produce the desired results.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about supporting loved ones during tough times:
target_text: Life can change at any time. That is why you need loved ones who can take care of you when things go south.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Change liberates and change elevates. If you want to live a life where you experience the greatest form of grace, live a life where you embrace change.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Sometimes change is what you need to do the things you never dared to do—to focus on big dreams and make them real.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seizing opportunities:
target_text: In life, not all opportunities will come easily. Some will even seem as if they do not exist. But it is up to you to search for, find, and utilize them while time still allows.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about staying focused on your own path:
target_text: Life will always offer you incredible opportunities to run your race. As you run that race, focus on your lane and not on your neighbours’ if you want to be great.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seizing opportunities:
target_text: Life will present you with good opportunities. Seize them and experience a life of possibilities.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seizing opportunities:
target_text: The older you get, the more you realize how short life can be. That is why you need to seize opportunities while they still exist.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seizing opportunities:
target_text: There are endless opportunities in life; do not miss out. Be smart and put yourself to the task of looking them up.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seizing opportunities:
target_text: Those who make it in life are those who seize opportunities, not those who are opportunists.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seizing opportunities:
target_text: When good opportunities come in your life, it is not time to sit around. It is time to arise and utilize them so you can prosper.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making a positive impact in the world:
target_text: While it is great to have equal opportunities in life, it is equally important to use those opportunities to make a difference in other people's lives.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about letting go of past disappointments:
target_text: A life of happiness requires you to get rid of any form of bitterness.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing individuality and self-acceptance:
target_text: Be content with your uniqueness in this world and live a life of happiness.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing happiness and refusing to be a playground in life:
target_text: Be kind, be happy and be wise. Refuse to be anyone’s playground in life. Embrace happiness wherever you are.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about trust:
target_text: If you want to live a life of happiness, do not trust those who are full of empty promises.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about accepting life's unexpected challenges:
target_text: Life happens! Just when you expect happiness, something tragic could happen. So, learn to accept any change of circumstance.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about Finding Happiness:
target_text: Life is great when you take charge of your happiness. If it happens that you lose it somewhere, go back and fetch it. Never leave behind your happiness, and never settle for a life of brokenness.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about prioritizing happiness:
target_text: Life is too short to be unhappy. Disengage from anyone or anything that takes your happiness away.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming sadness:
target_text: Never allow sadness to engulf your life. Learn to live a life of happiness.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about spreading happiness:
target_text: Play a role in securing happiness in your life and that of others. When you do that, you will experience leaps and bounds of happiness in life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about facing life's uncertainties:
target_text: No one has their life together, even if they do, it will not be forever. At some point in time, life happens to everyone.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Outstanding people are those who choose to stand up regardless of the setbacks in life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-mastery:
target_text: Self-mastery is a significant skill for those who want a life of victory.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding success through determination rather than traditional measures of achievement:
target_text: Some people made it in life not because they attained the highest marks in class but because they chose to make their mark.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Sometimes waking up is not easy, but waking up is what makes life easy.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about facing life's uncertainties:
target_text: The earth’s surface is not smooth everywhere. Life is just like that; it is full of twists and turns.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about focusing on personal growth rather than comparing oneself to others:
target_text: The most progressive approach to life is to discuss ideas rather than people.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming adversity:
target_text: The noble thing about life is that, in different ways, it treats everyone the same.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the purpose of life:
target_text: The true meaning of life is known by the One who made mankind.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about tackling life's challenges:
target_text: The wisdom to tackle the challenges of life differentiates extraordinary people from ordinary ones.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about moving forward:
target_text: There is only one direction in life: forward and not backward.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing life's fairness:
target_text: There will be times when life seems unfair. But the fortunate thing is that it eventually demonstrates that it can be fair.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about navigating life's challenges:
target_text: There’s no school of life where one can get certified. Yet it offers the same courses with a different set of tests for each person alive.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about kindness:
target_text: Those who stand up and do what is right. Those who shine their light so others can find the right path. Those who make life a little easier with their time, talent and treasure. deserve all the good things in life!

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming self-doubt:
target_text: Doubt casts away the possibility of living a purposeful life. Cast it away!

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about starting a new chapter in life:
target_text: It is not too late to turn a new page and write a good story of your life. There is more you can do if you do not keep your purpose out of sight.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding purpose in life:
target_text: Life grants each person a unique purpose to accomplish. You are here on earth for a reason; you just need to find it. If you cannot change the world, at least change yourself. Do something to make the world a better place.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding your passion:
target_text: Life is worthwhile when you walk on a path aligned with your purpose.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about pursuing your purpose:
target_text: Life will grant you the opportunity to pursue your purpose. Be well-informed, seek wisdom and ensure that whatever you do is purpose-aligned.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about staying true to your purpose:
target_text: The gift of life is too precious, do not live your life under the pressure of someone who misdirects you from your purpose.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about fulfilling your purpose:
target_text: When you honour the precepts of life, and fulfil your purpose, you will be delighted by its magnificence.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about realizing the splendour of life:
target_text: You can only realize the splendour of life if you are willing to fulfil your purpose while you still have time.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making impactful choices in life:
target_text: Endeavour to make the right choices in life. It will help you attract the right outcomes.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Life is what you make of it. It will not always give you what you want, but you can still choose what you want to become.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing challenges:
target_text: Life offers us an opportunity to live. Choose to live right and be a shining light.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making choices:
target_text: Life will offer you an opportunity to make choices. You can choose greatness or insignificance, brightness or darkness, happiness or sadness. Whatever you choose, let it be your choice and not somebody else’s.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about personal growth:
target_text: No matter what life throws your way, choose to be a much better person today than you were yesterday.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about choosing positive influences in your life:
target_text: Some people come into your life to make it worthwhile, while others come to waste time. Choose the ones worth your while.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about choosing positivity and surrounding yourself with uplifting influences:
target_text: Some people will make your life seem like heaven; others will make it seem like hell. Choose to ignore the latter. Life is better when you are surrounded by angels.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the power of mindset:
target_text: Everything rises and falls from mindset. If your mindset is right you will be right. If your mindset is wrong, you will be wrong. Let your mindset be optimistic.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about optimism:
target_text: Be optimistic! You can be the dream.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about preparing for the future:
target_text: Life is like a river. It only moves in one direction—towards the ocean. Your life is also moving in one direction—towards the cemetery. Therefore, prepare enough for a triumphant exit.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the beauty of nature:
target_text: Life is like a tree that provides shade. It is like the rain that waters the plants and the sunrise that makes people smile. It is such an amazing wonder.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the beauty of nature:
target_text: Life is like the vastness of the ocean; it reflects the workmanship of the Creator.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Sometimes in life, you need opposers. Like the air pressure that fills up a flat tyre and enables it to perform at its best, such people can help accelerate your growth process if you do not allow them to hinder your success.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about prioritizing inner beauty over outward appearance:
target_text: There comes a time in life when beauty has little or no value. That is why you should focus on what is more meaningful—invest in your brains. Do not allow beauty to deceive you; it fades, just like a magnificent building going up in flames.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing challenges:
target_text: When nighttime comes, it becomes dark—such is life. There won’t be sunshine all the time, learn to live with that.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance and timing:
target_text: When other people’s lives are flourishing but yours is not, do not give up. Not all flowers bloom at the same time. Like a flower that blooms in summer, you will flourish if you persevere during the dry seasons of life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about treating others with kindness:
target_text: In this life, we are here for a short while. How we will be remembered after that depends on how we treat others while alive.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about adapting to change:
target_text: Life happened as it has, so we could be what we had to be.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Life happens so we can become what we need to become.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about personal responsibility:
target_text: Life is given to each one of us. In most cases, we choose how we want to navigate our individual paths.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming adversity:
target_text: Life is not about the absence of trials. They will somehow show up even if we did not commit any crime. The presence of trials helps us stand the test of time.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the power of resilience:
target_text: Life often finds a way of teaching us something, whether we are willing to learn or unwilling.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about breaking societal limits:
target_text: Life will not always be easy, but we can make it easy when we collectively choose to break the existing limits in our society.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming adversity:
target_text: Sometimes the tears we shed prepare us for the best life we could ever have.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing life's journey:
target_text: Sometimes we are so caught up in the issues of life that we forget the point of departure. We are nothing but voyagers with limited time. We should live each day with a great sense of duty, knowing that one day we will account for this adventure.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about facing life's challenges:
target_text: The hardships of life can never be avoided completely. We must be ready to deal with whatsoever happens on this journey.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about problem-solving:
target_text: There will be fewer problems in life if we cease to entrust problematic people with the development of solutions.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about valuing the gift of life:
target_text: We ought to preserve life with our all. It is a gift that can never be sold at any store.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about focusing on strengths rather than weaknesses:
target_text: Anyone can become great in life as long as they stop focusing on what they do not have and build on what they do have until their greatness is manifest.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding balance in life:
target_text: Every chapter of life does not have to be funny; it does not have to be painful either.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about deserving a better life:
target_text: Every human being deserves a better life; it is the inhumane ones who do not mind taking that better life away from others.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about eternal beauty:
target_text: Genuine beauty never fades, even when the journey of life ends.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about facing challenges:
target_text: If life was so easy, it would not be worth living. It is the mountains and valleys that make life exciting.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking risks:
target_text: It is risky not to take calculated risks in life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience and acceptance:
target_text: No one has a perfect life; that is the bottom line.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming victim mentality:
target_text: Life, unfortunately, does not offer VIP seats to people with a victim mentality. So, you either claim your victory or you continue to be the victim of circumstances.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance and faith:
target_text: When going through hard times, hold on tight until you overcome. With perseverance and God on your side, things will get better. Never give up on yourself, no matter how hard life becomes. One day, you will be fine.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about discernment:
target_text: Pray for discernment. It is quite significant because if you cannot discern, you will invite to your table the people meant to cause you torment.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about achieving success and leaving a positive impact:
target_text: Life is a loan which you will one day have to repay before God. Ensure that the day you repay it, you are met with rapturous applause.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing the wonders of the natural world:
target_text: Life is a series of many mysteries. Go out there and make great discoveries. The sweet caress of Mother Nature will help you experience God’s splendour.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-love and attracting blessings:
target_text: Cherish the gift of life that you have been given. Trust that your Creator can do great things through you. Love yourself and be content with the life you have and you will become a magnet that attracts blessings from all corners of the earth.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: The journey of life is not always smooth. Pray for the courage to continue, even when things get hard.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seeking wisdom and making wise choices:
target_text: Pray for wisdom and discernment so you can know which places to go or avoid, which people to welcome or shun, because being wise can make a big difference in your life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-confidence:
target_text: The One who gave you the gift of life knows that you are good enough. Do not ever doubt what you carry on the inside. Live the rest of your life maximizing your potential.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-reflection and personal growth:
target_text: If you are objective enough to evaluate your journey through life, you will come to the right conclusions about who you are.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Life is a great journey. So, refuse to be idle and never let others drag you where you should not be going.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about avoiding assumptions:
target_text: On this journey of life, never rely on assumptions; they can lead you to wrong conclusions.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about persevering through life's challenges:
target_text: Sometimes the journey of life can be hard to comprehend. It is like surfing; the best way to enjoy the waves is to study them, know them and experience them.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: Sometimes the journey of life will be too hard, but that does not mean you will never overcome.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance and self-reliance:
target_text: Sometimes, the journey of life can be difficult, but remember, this is your race to run; no one can do it on your behalf.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about facing challenges:
target_text: The journey of life is not easy, but the difficulties along the way make it interesting to navigate.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about focusing on your own path:
target_text: The journey of life is travelled by many, but only a few run in their lane because more people focus on what others are doing and where others are going instead of paying more attention to their own destinies.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making the most of each day:
target_text: Every living being is presented with the gift of life. It is up to each one to decide what to do with it while there is still time. Blessed are those who make theirs count.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about gratitude:
target_text: Life is a precious gift, but not everyone can experience a fulfilling life. If you are fortunate enough to have one, be thankful for that.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about cherishing life:
target_text: Regardless of how you perceive it, life is the greatest gift every human being has ever received. Be cheerful about it, and cherish it.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about appreciating life:
target_text: No matter where you are, appreciate the gift of life. Find reasons to smile because there comes a time when it becomes impossible to see the sunrise.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about valuing the gift of life:
target_text: The gift of life must not only be received, it must also be highly prized because it is precious.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making the most of each day:
target_text: Life is a gift which you will get a chance to unwrap each morning as you wake up. Therefore, be a good recipient of this gift. Use it to make an impact.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding positivity in life's challenges:
target_text: A bee will sting but still make honey. A rose will prick, but have a good scent. Life is like that, there will always be bad and good aspects. Yours is to focus on what is more important.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing individuality:
target_text: Life is like a colouring book. The drawings may be very standard, but you can choose to colour them in a manner that makes them stand out.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about nurturing positivity and resisting negativity:
target_text: Life is like a garden. Nurture it and plant the right seeds so they can bear good fruits. Do not let anyone plant the wrong seeds in your life because you will harvest them.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: Life is like a glass bowl—very fragile. Please handle it with utmost care because once it breaks, it will still have cracks even after glueing it together.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about toxic relationships:
target_text: Life is quite short, do not cut it short by associating with those who make you feel small.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making the most of your opportunities:
target_text: Life is short, but one thing is for sure; the life you have is yours, so give it your best shot.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the importance of kindness and positive company:
target_text: Life is so good, when you are surrounded by good people.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about authenticity:
target_text: Life is surely not a movie, do not live it as though you were acting. Be genuine.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Life is too short to be whining. Keep dreaming, keep grinding, and keep winning.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about surrounding yourself with genuine love:
target_text: Life is very fragile. Surround yourself with those who exude genuine love!

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seizing the moment:
target_text: Life is way too short. Cherish the days you have above the surface of the soil, learn to ignore the unsettling noise and use the time you have to do more.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding joy in the midst of challenges:
target_text: Life may not always be pleasant but to find pleasure, you need to appreciate the good and refrain from always complaining about the bad.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Life may not always give you what you want, but do not give up on what you want; until you realize you did all that was required.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about facing adversity:
target_text: Life is not as easy as it sounds. It is about sailing troubled waters, navigating unprecedented times, and carving new paths.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: Life may not always go your way, but you will always feel great when you bring your A-game.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about fairness:
target_text: Life may not seem fair; but it does give everyone a fair chance.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about spreading positivity and kindness:
target_text: Life rewards those who espouse goodness. Do good even if people are not good to you. You will ultimately feel good and enjoy the goodness of the seeds you planted.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: Life will always have its highs and lows. Do not just go with the flow. Learn to bloom, even when you are feeling low.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seeking help when facing challenges:
target_text: Life will always present one problem or another. If you cannot solve them, do not be shy about seeking help from others.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: Life will always take you through various seasons. Learn to thrive in each season and come out ready to deal with any situation.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: Life will always throw different situations at you, no matter who you are or where you are, but there is comfort in knowing those situations do not last forever. So, no matter how hard life gets, you can always bounce back.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Life will always throw in big demands, but you can meet them if you do not give up.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about learning:
target_text: Life will constantly grant you an opportunity to learn. Use it well.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: Life will always have oceans and forests, mountains and valleys, battles and victories. Let each experience shape you to be a better human.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: Life will not always be easy, but the ups and downs make it amazing.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Life is not always easy, but when you believe, you will find ways to win.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:
target_text: Life will not present a clear path all the time. Ahead, it may get dark, yet you have to keep moving forward. Do not lose hope when you go through hard times, because eventually, you will find the light.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seizing opportunities:
target_text: Life will offer you a chance to present your gifts to the world. It is up to you to grab that chance or live with regret.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: Life will present you with great things after you have endured some gruesome tests.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Life will sometimes force you to sail through uncharted waters. Always use to your advantage, such life-changing encounters.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about collaboration and self-worth:
target_text: Life will sometimes require that you partner with others in order to access a larger piece of the pie. As you do that, always avoid those who do not realize that you also deserve good things in life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Life will take you to places you have never been, let you meet people who pull your heartstrings and help you not to lose your rhythm.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about acknowledging life's realities:
target_text: Life becomes better when you keep these realities in mind. 1. Your days are numbered, 2. You are not better than anyone, and 3. You can’t just live anyhow.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about clarity and vision:
target_text: Life without a clear vision can be frustrating. Do not jump on the bandwagon of those who do not know where they are going. Seek clarity on what you need to do in order to keep growing.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: We can allow life’s tragedies to make us bitter and resentful, or we can see them as tests of our character and humility, allowing them to make us ever thankful, not only for a life but for this very life—for my life and your life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about gratitude:
target_text: Each of us has only one life, unique from every other, and we all have reason to ask, Why me?, not in bitterness or despair but in awe and gratitude.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about sacrifices:
target_text: Goals are, by definition, linked to sacrifices. A goal is a focus, and one cannot have a focus without excluding that which is outside that focus.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about sacrifice:
target_text: Your life is one giant, continuous sacrifice being poured out on the altar of your choosing, moment by moment and day by day.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about sacrifice:
target_text: You’ve been sacrificing your life for your entire life, and you will continue to do so until you have no more life left to sacrifice. Your only choice is what you sacrifice it to.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about achieving success:
target_text: Success is sweet but to achieve success, it takes strong work ethics, continuous improvement, discipline and determination.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about achieving success through passion and consistent practice:
target_text: Passion and talent with right knowledge and consistent practice leads to self fulfilment.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about discovering your passion:
target_text: Figuring out your motivators, values that move and guide you and what inspires you leads you to what you want to be.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about achieving goals:
target_text: A goal is not the same thing as a wish. A goal is something you work toward; a wish is something you hope will happen to you.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding wisdom in challenging circumstances:
target_text: Wisdom is found in nature only by mining a lot of rock.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming success and finding fulfillment:
target_text: What discouraged me most from the goals of my youth were not my failures but my successes, that they proved so hollow.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Worthy goals are always hard.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about prioritizing success over family:
target_text: If my family is the price of my success, then I am grateful to have had so little of it.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing change:
target_text: Your identity is formed in part by your past, but only in part, and not the most important part. Your past is merely a starting point.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding your purpose:
target_text: Who are you? You are your aim. You are a seeker of whatever you seek.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the importance of perseverance:
target_text: Your aim is not just what you train your eye on; it is how you train your eye.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the power of intention:
target_text: Your aim has the power to turn every good into an evil or every evil into a good. Through it you interpret your past, give purpose to your present, and cast a vision for your future.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about aiming for your legacy:
target_text: Only by making your legacy your aim can you ensure that your essential goals, those that stir from your very essence, remain uncorrupted by a million other, lesser goals that constantly vie for your attention.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about aiming for a meaningful legacy:
target_text: Only by making your legacy your aim can you summon the courage to act with conviction in the moment, whatever that moment may bring.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about living in the present moment:
target_text: Life is not a series. It has no omnibus. Live it without worrying about the past. Do not relive it. Close your eyes, and mind to what lies behind; so you can focus on the now.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about living authentically:
target_text: Life is not a show. Do not put up any performances. Just live it, and be willing to grow.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about running your own race:
target_text: Life is not about competing with others. It is about running your race with courage, and completing it in the right lane.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about making a lasting impact:
target_text: Life is not about the loud cheers, or the pats on the back. It is about making an impact.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming obstacles:
target_text: Life is not as easy as it sounds. It is about sailing troubled waters, navigating unprecedented times. and carving new paths.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seeking guidance in times of uncertainty:
target_text: Life is not black and white. There are many grey areas. That is why you need God to direct your paths.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance and determination:
target_text: Life is not easy, but when you put your mind to your vision, and work hard to achieve it, many people will think you have it easy.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about leaving a long-lasting impact:
target_text: Life is not just about putting your foot on the ground, it is about leaving a trail of footprints that create a long-lasting impact.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing imperfections:
target_text: Life is perfect in the pictures, but when you look closely you will notice plenty of imperfections. So even if you are not picture-perfect, never think your life is any less important.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seizing opportunities:
target_text: Life is precious, so make it count. Many people on their deathbeds are bargaining for more seconds, minutes, hours, days, years or decades to be alive. Yet, for them it is time to go to the other side. Never waste the time you have now.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about leaving a positive impact on others:
target_text: Imagine living your life so indelibly that others remember your smile long after they’ve forgotten your name!

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about practicing gratitude:
target_text: The alternative to a posture of humble gratitude is one of entitlement, which produces thanklessness toward your own blessings and envy toward the blessings of others.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about fairness:
target_text: It’s not fair! is the mantra not of the poor and oppressed but of the rich and spoiled. The poor and oppressed of the world don’t pout, It’s not fair!—they know the world too well to dare.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance and humility:
target_text: When life is perpetually unfair in your favor, it is tempting to believe that you deserve it.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about recognizing and celebrating the unique strengths of others:
target_text: When everyone we know is a king or a queen, it is easy not to notice each other’s crowns, except when it benefits our self-pity or vanity to compare them.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about freedom:
target_text: You and I enjoy a measure of freedom few have ever known, and it was not our blood that purchased it.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about freedom:
target_text: Our freedom is not a right we have won but a privilege conferred on us by those who sacrificed much that we might have it.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming adversity:
target_text: Once we’ve been victimized, none of us can choose not to have been victimized; we can only choose how to respond.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming challenges:
target_text: Never indulge your victimization by labeling yourself a victim, regardless of how much you deserve the title.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking ownership of your life:
target_text: When you label yourself a victim, you compel those around you to pay homage to your victimhood. Don’t do that.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking control of your circumstances:
target_text: The only one who can give final assent to your victimhood is you.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming victimization:
target_text: To merely survive victimization is to let it consume you still, only bite by bite rather than all at once, to let it loiter in your life and chew at you forever. The only way to truly overcome victimization is to transcend it.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about facing challenges:
target_text: Perhaps you are no rock climber, but faced with a big enough rock, you will have to become one.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing pain:
target_text: Be grateful for pain. Don’t ignore it or deny it. Don’t anesthetize yourself from it. Swallow it and make it a part of you.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about transcending victimization:
target_text: Only once you can truthfully say you are grateful for your victimization have you transcended it.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming setbacks:
target_text: There are many injustices that will simply never be made right, and to expect otherwise is to set yourself up to be consumed by frustration.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about seeking justice:
target_text: Justice is a fickle mistress, alluring but elusive, ever delivering less than she promises.

input_text: yamlProvide a motivational quote about pursuing justice:
target_text: Spend your life chasing justice and only one thing is certain: You will have spent your life.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about resilience:
target_text: To expect a hospitable world is hubris. Instead, expect the opposite. Expect a world that may destroy you at its whim at any moment.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about justice:
target_text: Neither lion nor gazelle question whether it is just for the lion to catch and eat the gazelle or just for the gazelle to get away and let the lion starve.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about justice:
target_text: Justice is the delusion of the self-entitled. To desire it is to desire a world that is not this world.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the power of resilience:
target_text: Whatever your world is, you are alive, and an incomprehensible number of things had to happen just the way they did for that to be the case.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about finding gratitude in challenging situations:
target_text: You may be appalled by your world, but you must be gratefully appalled.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the preciousness of life:
target_text: Your life has come at the expense of a nearly infinite number of other potential lives that will now never get to be lived because you get to live.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about gratitude:
target_text: You have but one life. You could spend it taking stock of what others have and resenting it, or you could spend it taking stock of what you have and doing something with it.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about embracing diversity and taking action:
target_text: Categorizing yourself by either your victimization or your privilege fails to give any clarity to life’s fundamental question: What are you going to do with it?

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming adversity:
target_text: Wallowing in victimhood only demeans and paralyzes you. Don’t do it. Redeem it instead. Transcend it instead.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about endurance and purpose:

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the value of gratitude:

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about overcoming criticism:

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about leadership:

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the power of determination:

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about personal growth:

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:

target_text: Ain't there nothing sapiens can't do,Ain't no mountain sapiens can't climb.Ain't no darkness sapiens can't conquer,Ain't no division sapiens can't undivide.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about living authentically:

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about the importance of communication:

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about gratitude:

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about perseverance:

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about celebrating small victories:

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about taking action:

target_text: Greatness is not a gift, it's a choice. It's not a talent, it's a habit. And habits can be built through consistency, dedication, and unwavering commitment.

input_text: Provide a motivational quote about self-discipline:

target_text: People with a strong sense of purpose, persistence and accomplishment perform better at work.
